'''Task name:''' 
SCIM and OpenOffice testing

'''Description:''' 
Procedure on how to make sure SCIM works well on OpenOffice.

'''Procedure:'''
* Install suitable module for SCIM
** Say for simplified Chinese, install scim-pinyin. Generally, language-pack-* or language-support-* should have installed necessary input modules for you.
* Login under suitable language environment, say japanese or chinese.
* Fire up OpenOffice
* Press Ctrl-Space, check SCIM comes up
** If there is no problem, SCIM panel should show up at right bottom of screen.
* Type something
** Just try some random characters on keyboard, characters should be inputted into OpenOffice.
